metadata.subject: France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
metadata.title: Don patriotique, ou, Nouvelle adresse aux militaires, et à tous les citoyens français
metadata.creator: French Revolution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
Louis XVI Trial and Execution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.description: Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
A harsh criticism of the Assemblée nationale constituante
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
Forms part of the Louis XVI Trial and Execution Collection at the Newberry Library
Uncut and loose-bound in v. 8 of a collection of pamphlets in contemporary cartonnage bindings, with pink pastepaper over boards and blue paper spine labels
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
